subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Julius Kogo of Kenya won the Crim 10-mile race in Flint, Mich., for the fifth straight year. Kogo’s unofficial time was 46:35.
snippet: Julius Kogo of Kenya won the Crim 10-mile race in Flint, Mich., for the fifth straight year. Kogo’s unofficial time was 46:35.
